overview_description:
Instead of looking back, we're looking forward, filling your 2024 calendar with the best moments Mother Nature has to offer.
Ready to plan your future?
login_error: You have provided an invalid email or pin.
pin_helper_text: Enter a PIN you’ll remember. You’ll need it to access and edit your calendar later.
email_error_msg_2: Please enter a valid email address
pin_error_msg: Please enter a four-digit numeric PIN
login_invalid: The email and or pin you entered is incorrect
login_heading: Welcome back, let’s get you logged in
login_helper_text: If you don’t remember your PIN, your calendar is locked. You can recreate your calendar here.
signup_heading:
GET REady to 
get out there
signup_subheading: Sync your events to your calendar app.
landing_subheader: Fill your year with the best outdoor events from around the world.
cookie_consent: This website uses cookies for data analytics. Privacy Policy
event_helper_text: Select events to build your calendar.
download_subheader: Open the .ics file to automatically add everything to your calendar app.
